item.description:
Let us meet for Tibetan Food followed by drinks, lounging and dancing at Diva Lounge.


Dinner Location:
Martsa on Elm
233 Elm St
Ste A
Somerville, MA 02144
(617) 666-0660


Lounge & Night Club:
Diva Lounge
248 Elm St
Somerville, MA 02144
Phone: (617) 629-4963

Dresscode: Stylish club wear (no sneakers and no baggy jeans)
item.how_to_find_us: My cell is 5083147742. Let me know if you are running late or need directions.
item.name: Tibetan Food followed by Drinks & Lounging at Diva Lounge
